org.icepdf.core.pobjects.fonts.ofont

Class OFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icepdf.core.pobjects.fonts.ofont.OFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FontFile

    public class OFont
extends Object
implements FontFile
    OFont is an awt Font wrapper used to aid in the paint of glyphs.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.icepdf.core.pobjects.fonts.FontFile

      • deriveFont

        public FontFile deriveFont(float pointsize)
        Description copied from interface: FontFile
        Creates nfont a new pointsize, assuming 72 ppi. Note to subclassers: you must make a complete independent instance of the nfont here, even if point size and everything else is the same, as other deriveFont methods use this to make a clone and might make subsequent changes.
        Specified by:
        deriveFont in interface FontFile
        Parameters:
        pointsize - point size of font.
        Returns:
        fontFile with associated point size.

        public URL getSource()
        Description copied from interface: FontFile
        Gets the source url of the underlying file if any. Embedded fonts will not have a source.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        null if the font is embedded, otherwise the font system path.
